name: Stargate Finance
description: Stargate Finance is a fully composable cross-chain bridge for native assets that uses the Delta algorithm. The protocol unifies liquidity pools via the LayerZero protocol and has instant finality. Users can have a say in protocol governance by locking its native STG token.
